body.name: Emerson MWRG0901W Retro Digital Microwave Oven with Timer & LED Display 800W with 5 Micro Power Levels, 8 Pre-Programmed Settings, 1,000W Grill Function with Child Safe Lock, 0.9 Cu. Ft, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 59 mins
features: This microwave oven features a sleek and stylish retro white design that is sure to complement any kitchen decor. The cabinet and front panel are both coated in a white finish that gives it a classic and vintage look. The retro design is not only aesthetically pleasing but also practical, as it allows for easy cleaning and maintenance.

Chromed Handle and Control Buttons: The handle and control buttons of this microwave are made with a chromed finish that adds a touch of elegance to the appliance. The handle is easy to grip and sturdy, making it easy to open and close the microwave door. The control buttons are also easy to use, with clear and legible labels that indicate their respective functions.

5 Power Levels: This microwave has 5 different power levels to choose from, which allows you to adjust the cooking power based on the type of food you are cooking. The power levels range from low to high, allowing you to cook delicate foods like fish or defrost frozen items without cooking them.

8 Pre-programmed Settings: This microwave comes equipped with 8 pre-programmed settings that allow you to cook popular foods like popcorn, potatoes, beverages, pizza, reheated leftovers, frozen vegetables, meat, and soup. The pre-programmed settings take the guesswork out of cooking and ensure that your food is cooked perfectly every time.

Time and Weight Defrost: The time and weight defrost features of this microwave allow you to quickly and easily defrost frozen food items. The time defrost function allows you to enter the desired defrosting time, while the weight defrost function automatically calculates the defrosting time based on the weight of the food. This makes it easy to defrost food items like meat or poultry without having to wait for them to thaw naturally.
body.description: With a retro design that adds flair to any kitchen, the Emerson 0.9 cu. ft. 800W Microwave Oven with Grill is more than just a stylish appliance. It's your new go-to for quick and easy cooking. This microwave doesn't just look the part - it performs beautifully too. The multi-stage cooking ability allows you to combine the microwave and grill to lock in flavor and texture. Eight auto cook programs take the guesswork out of cooking popcorn, pizza, frozen foods and more. With features like a kitchen timer, child safety lock, and removable turntable, the Emerson Retro Microwave has everything busy families need to cook meals with convenience. Its retro styling gives it broad appeal in farmhouse, industrial, vintage or contemporary kitchens. Bring personality and power to your countertop with the Emerson Retro Microwave Oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really pretty color and easy to use. Takes up little room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great and looks cute doing it. What more could I want?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars cool looking inexpensive microwave...
reviews.reviewText: ... that's great for small spaces. I ditched a big clunky one for this one. It has far less power than my old one according to specs but it still seems to do the same job as far as I can tell. If you need to put big plates in your MW then this is not for you. But if you just need to re-heat things or steam veggies etc. this is perfect. No complaints whatsoever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Uneven heat, horrible Ui
reviews.reviewText: The controls are horrid, the dial does not set time, but cycles through modes listed from A1-A9.Don't know what does what as I didn't keep the booklet.The biggest issue however is it doesn't heat food evenly.Throw a pizza slice in for 30 seconds and you get very spotty heat.Majority of the food item will be warm, with nickel size spots that are still cold/frozen and other spots that are hotter than the surface of the sun.I hate it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute red microwave oven
reviews.reviewText: We ordered this red microwave mostly for the red color, though we're happy with the way it works, too. It's not cheap and plastic like some kitchen appliances. So far, so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my father who really needed a new one. I liked it because it has the dial which he prefers. I gave this a 4 star only due to the price. Everything is so expensive now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There is a bit a learning curve but after a few weeks you got it. I play around with the set functions and remember the ones I use the most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for wonderful product.
reviews.reviewText: Reasonable price and fantastic appliance. At last I have a micro glass rotating plate that stays on the base. Just keep it simple: press Power, Time and Start. Easy-Peary,
